name: Resonance Miner
description:
This is a Ludum Dare 30 (Connected Worlds) game! 

Best described as a mashup of Asteroids and an Eve Online mining simulator.

Mine asteroids, upgrade your ship, discover wormholes, bring back the Omega Ore.

Controls as of right now:

  • Mouse - aim ship.
  • W or Space - for thrusters.
  • Mouse Click - select / target asteroids.
  • 1 - currently only one module available to activate.

If you have any suggestions, tell me at @andreimarks!
